name: ems-web-app-messages
author: Chris Spence (https://educationalmediasolutions.com)
description: This angular.io module includes a component and service that can be used to render "Growl" or "Snackbar" style in-app messages.

scripts.publish-npm: git add -A . && git commit -m 'prepublish npm package' && npm version patch && ng build messages && cd dist && npm publish
